critique: The document is a formal order from the President to exempt Clarence H. Branscombe from compulsory retirement for one year. It is a legal document, and the language is formal and objective. There is no explicit expression of joy, sadness, fear, disgust, or surprise. The emotions conveyed are very minimal, so I will assign a low score to each emotion.
